ExpSyntax.val: Trim (StrToken ({0,10},1,','))=Trim ({0,11}) AND (Trim (StrToken ({0,30},1,','))=Trim ({0,31}) OR Trim (StrToken ({0,30},2,','))=Trim ({0,31})) AND (ISNULL ({0,33}) OR ISNULL ({0,34}))
